Disclaimer for e-gujarati.in

Please contact us by email at support@e-gujarati.in if you require any additional information or have any queries about our site’s disclaimer.

Disclaimers for e-gujarati.in

All information on this website – https://e-gujarati.in/ – is provided in good faith and solely for the purpose of providing general information. e-gujarati.in takes no responsibility or warranties about the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of this information. Any action you take as a result of the information on this website (e-gujarati.in) is solely at your own risk. e-gujarati.in is not responsible for any losses or damages incurred as a result of using our website.

You can visit other websites by clicking on hyperlinks to such external sites from our website. We make every effort to give only high-quality links to useful and ethical websites, but we have no control over their content or nature. These links to other websites do not mean that all of the content on other sites is recommended. Owners and content on the site may change without warning, and this may happen before we have a chance to delete a potentially harmful connection.

Please be aware that when you leave our website, other sites’ privacy policies and conditions may differ from ours, and we have no control over them. Before doing any business or posting any information, please read the Privacy Policies as well as the “Terms of Service” of these sites. The blogEarns’s Privacy Policy Generator created our Privacy Policy.

Consent

You consent to our disclaimer and agree to its conditions by using our website.

Update

If we update, alter, or edit this document in any way, those changes will be prominently displayed here.
